original_text:
Therefore a curse devours the earth,
    and its inhabitants suffer for their guilt;
therefore the inhabitants of the earth are scorched,
    and few men are left.
korean_text: 그러므로 저주가 땅을 삼켰고 그 중에 사는 자들이 정죄함을 당하였고 땅의 주민이 불타서 남은 자가 적도다

sentences.original_text: Therefore a curse devours the earth
and its inhabitants suffer for their guilt
sentences.korean_translation: 그 거민들이 자기 죄악 때문에 고통을 받으니

sentences.original_text: therefore the inhabitants of the earth are scorched
